section.name: Aim
section.p: This page aims to be a handy reference not only of the work done but also of work pending. Users who want new features should submit patches to this page. Developers who want to lend a hand can grab tasks from this page. Everyone can see the progress which is being made.

section.name: TODO list
section.p: The following is a list of items still TODO for Math. Contributions are welcome!
